attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: I wanted to find a good reason to for Donald and Im not one to write a review, but this got annoying. When I opened the app it  was fine. Two seconds later I see it glitching all over the place and then it kicked me out. If he can’t fix his app then how is he supposed to America.
